Services

Creative Lab

We create bespoke Interactive and Visual solutions for clients that want to engage with their customers in a way never imagined before.

Electrics & Data

We are NICEIC approved electrical installation company for all your Commercial and domestic requirements in this ever changing digital world.

Smart Lighting

Set your scenes, Create your mood, advance lighting and control from the wall, app or voice.

Smart Security

We provide cost effective advanced security solutions installations for Intruder Alarms, Fire, CCTV, access control and door entry systems.

Portfolio

Projects

These are some of the recent projects that Dovestarr has delivered.

Dovestarr was approached to explore interactive solutions for the new Great Ormond Street Hospital (GOSH) Disney Reef Project.

This ranged from Interactive games on multitouch screens in the digital aquarium.

Explore creating a projected static Peter Pan Shadow with options of shadow heights and poses above the signage looking over the Disney garden.

Delve into creating a projection, mapped onto the rear of the clam with the projector hidden within the mask of the pirate ship.

The video effects should be in synergy within the garden design but also allow for creative effects and a video player with content from Disney archives.

Working alongside ROAR creativity based in Camden London who designed the concept, we carried out the Electrical installation to all elements required in this project.

Cleaver use of vintage lighting alongside its Victorian feel gave it its wow factor to this very successful business.
